channel.title: BSH Npc Scripting Bug
channel.description: Regarding BSH scripting, I got it all to work, however if I click off a set of options using the "PickOption("blah, "blah, blah");" method and try talking to another npc, the dialogue does not switch npcs. Example: If I talk to a man (ID 011) and click off the set of options, then talk to a guard, the man will be saying the guards lines. How do I fix this?

item.title: BSH Npc Scripting Bug
item.dc:creator: @Wife_Beater Wife Beater
item.description:
@Wife_Beater wrote:

Regarding BSH scripting, I got it all to work, however if I click off a set of options using the "PickOption(“blah, “blah, blah”);” method and try talking to another npc, the dialogue does not switch npcs. Example: If I talk to a man (ID 011) and click off the set of options, then talk to a guard, the man will be saying the guards lines. How do I fix this?

Read full topic
